quote: Then Walter died as he lived, he told his mate. A hero, a soldier, and a survivor who chose to protect what was precious to him. I don't think, if you could ask him, that he would have any regrets.
quote_letters: THEN WALTER DIED AS HE LIVED HE TOLD HIS MATE A HERO A SOLDIER AND A SURVIVOR WHO CHOSE TO PROTECT WHAT WAS PRECIOUS TO HIM I DONT THINK IF YOU COULD ASK HIM THAT HE WOULD HAVE ANY REGRETS
